mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, C_CODE, C_STATUS, C_NAME, C_PRICE, C_START_DATE, C_END_DATE, C_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, USER_ID, C_CODE, C_STATUS, C_NAME, C_PRICE, C_START_DATE, C_END_DATE, C_CONTENT FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID, A.C_CODE, NVL(A.C_STATUS, 'Y') C_STATUS, NVL(B.C_NAME, '') C_NAME, NVL(B.C_PRICE, 0) C_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(B.C_START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') C_START_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(B.C_END_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') C_END_DATE, NVL(B.C_CONTENT, '') C_CONTENT FROM WD_COUPON A, WD_COUPON_INFO B WHERE A.C_CODE = B.C_CODE AND A.USER_ID = #{value})) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 10
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_COUPON SET C_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE C_CODE = ( SELECT C_CODE FROM WD_REZ WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND REZ_STATUS = 'N' ) AND USER_ID = #{value}
UPDATE WD_COUPON SET C_STATUS = 'N' WHERE C_CODE = (SELECT C_CODE FROM WD_REZ WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND REZ_STATUS = 'C' ) AND USER_ID = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT C.USER_ID AS USER_ID, NVL(C.C_CODE, '') AS C_CODE, NVL(C.C_STATUS, 'N') AS C_STATUS, NVL(I.C_NAME, '') AS C_NAME, NVL(I.C_PRICE, 0) AS C_PRICE FROM WD_COUPON C, WD_REZ R, WD_COUPON_INFO I WHERE C.C_CODE = R.C_CODE AND C.C_CODE = I.C_CODE AND C.USER_ID = R.USER_ID AND R.REZ_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.USER_ID = #{userId} AND R.REZ_NO = #{rezNo}

SELECT USER_ID, C_CODE, C_STATUS, C_NAME, C_PRICE, C_START_DATE, C_END_DATE, C_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, USER_ID, C_CODE, C_STATUS, C_NAME, C_PRICE, C_START_DATE, C_END_DATE, C_CONTENT FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID, A.C_CODE, NVL(A.C_STATUS, 'Y') C_STATUS, NVL(B.C_NAME, '') C_NAME, NVL(B.C_PRICE, 0) C_PRICE, NVL(TO_CHAR(B.C_START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') C_START_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(B.C_END_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') C_END_DATE, NVL(B.C_CONTENT, '') C_CONTENT FROM WD_COUPON A, WD_COUPON_INFO B WHERE A.C_CODE = B.C_CODE AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.C_STATUS = #{cStatus} )) WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 10
